Why didn't I thought of that before?  Thank you very much Mike, that was very interesting.  Microwaves might also be a nice echo box for voices.  Though, I think the addition of a sine wave might be needed for optimum results, that and the cooperation of the spirit world to talk into a microwave.  As for the AM reception, maybe a more direct grounding could help prevent it, so could unpowering the oven entirely.  How about doing the same test, outside, on a lawn, with the power plug buried?


This is fun!
Thanks again Mike,
Vincent
